thread.title: Anushka Sharma and Ranbir Kapoor shoot an adoration melody for ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma and Ranbir Kapoor shoot an adoration melody for ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Anushka Sharma and Ranbir Kapoor shoot an adoration melody for ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 6 (CINEWS): Subsequent to wrapping up the Paris planned shoot, the group of ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’ have moved to Austria. Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma alongside film’s chief Karan Johar are having a ton of fun while shooting for the film. 
At present, the “PK” star is shooting for an affection tune with Ranbir Kapoor for ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil in the mountains of Innsbruck, Tirol. The performer prior imparted a photo of her to form designer Manish Malhotra and now we present to you an affection’s look tune from ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’. 
Supposedly, we’ll see Anushka moving on a sentimental adoration tune wearing a saree for the first run through, that too in a freezy blanketed moutains of Austria! Much the same as us, Anushka is amped up for the tune also. 
Think about what’s occurring here ? Never thought I’d get the chance to do this ! #AeDilHaiMushkil pic.twitter.com/1qpe07CYtz 
— Anushka Sharma (@AnushkaSharma) October 5, 2015 
We can anticipate that the tune will be a run of the mill Kjo love melody.While Ranbir and Anushka are shooting for their scenes, the film’s group anticipate the vicinity of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who will soon go along with them after promoting her expected flick ‘Jazbaa’. 
Karan Johar is coming back to the executive’s seat with this film following a gap of three years. He last helmed Varun Dhawan-Alia Bhatt starrer ‘student of the Year’ in 2012. ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’ harps on relationships and heartbreakings. Related Posts
